## Set up

```{r}
library(sf)
library(sfheaders)
library(southernMaps)
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

## Download and save nztm data

```{r}
nztm <-   nzAndIslands |> st_as_sf()

save(nztm, file = 'data/nztm.rda')
```

## Convert to wgs84 and save

```{r}
nz84 <- nztm |> 
  st_transform(crs = 4326) # nztm is 2193

save(nz84, file = 'data/nz84.rda')
```


## Plotting

### very basic plot

```{r}
nztm |> st_geometry() |> plot(graticule=T)
```

### Plot with `ggplot`

```{r}
nztm |> 
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf(fill='grey', colour=0) 
```


### Plot Hauraki Gulf with `ggplot`

```{r}
nztm |> 
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf(fill='grey', colour=0) +
  xlim(1.73e6,1.85e6) +
  ylim(5.9e6,6.06e6)
```
